extendedInfo.description: ***As always, our kid's apps have no ads or in-app purchases.***Your city is under attack! You must defend it against the unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) that are advancing by hacking into their internal computers and sending the self-destruct codes for each UAV before it reaches your city!The self-destruct codes are sent each time you correctly answer a math problem.  Answer quickly and correctly or your city will be destroyed!What reviewers are saying about Math Defense:"If there is someone in your household who is learning math, definitely pick this app up." -DroidIdol.com"...don't be ashamed if you find yourself playing math defense long after little Johnny went to bed." - 100BestAndroidApps.com"Makes math fun!" -John"... it's a good, challenging math game with good replay value." -BillMath Defense-Addition is a math game that lets you practice math skills in addition.  You are able to focus on a specific set of numbers. The full version of the game allows you to practice subtraction, multiplication, and division too.Math Defense turns learning math facts into a fun game. You can start out slow and increase the speed as your skill increases.  With a high score list on each speed you'll find yourself getting better at math while trying to beat your last high score!There are 5 speeds, from beginner to insanely fast.Addition modes: 0-5, 0-10, 0-100Math Defense has simple touch controls that anyone can use.Great for kids and other students learning math.Can be used as just a multiplication game to help prepare for timed multiplication tests.Works great on tablets and phones.No Advertisements!

reviews.title: It keeps you on your toes
reviews.comment: I really like this game so far. It\'s fun and it makes you think.
reviews.author: Krystal Ward

reviews.title: What a game
reviews.comment: This game IS AWSOME !!!!!!!!!  Thank you for a amazing game!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just tried it with my 6 year old. He said he\'d play it! I hope he memorized addition this way!
reviews.author: Sarah Dysart

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is the first math app my kids have begged to play.
reviews.author: Carrie Vanduzee

reviews.title: Annie
reviews.comment: Awesome program! Great speed math drills for my kids to practice math facts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great way for my daughter to learn math facts!
reviews.comment: My daughter is 6 (first grade) and is learning her simple math facts.  This game is a fantastic and fun way for her to build her speed in solving simple addition problems.    We have an android tablet and a Samsung Gravity Smart android phone, and the game works great on both devices.  The game adapts well to the different sized screens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aweso
reviews.comment: Awesome game that gets you thinking
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very hard.
reviews.comment: Nice and setting the difficulty, makes it almost impossible!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very good way to learn to do basic math functions in your head
reviews.author: Justus Patrick
